alert.note: Alert for Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 2:37PM EST until January 11 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wappingers Creek at Wappingers Falls. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding and water begins to flood nearby homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Wappingers Creek Wappingers Falls Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Wed 2 pm: 8.0 Forecast: Wed 7 pm 8.0 Thu 1 am 8.0 Thu 7 am 7.8 Thu 1 pm 7.6 Thu 7 pm 7.2 Fri 1 am 6.5 Fri 7 am 6.0 Fri 1 pm 5.6 Fri 7 pm 5.4 Sat 1 am 5.4 Sat 7 am 5.6 &&
